wrappers.name: BubbleWrap
wrappers.description: A collection of (tested) helpers and wrappers used to wrap CocoaTouch code and provide more Ruby like APIs.

wrappers.name: Sugarcube
wrappers.description: These extensions hope to make development in RubyMotion more enjoyable by tacking 'UI' methods onto the base classes (String, Fixnum, Numeric). With sugarcube, you can create a color from an integer or symbol, or create a UIFont or UIImage from a string.

wrappers.name: MotionPrime
wrappers.description: MotionPrime is yet another framework written on RubyMotion for creating really fast iOS applications.

wrappers.name: RubyMotionQuery - RMQ
wrappers.description: A light, non-magical, non-polluting, jQuery-like library

wrappers.name: Elevate
wrappers.description: Stop scattering your domain logic across your view controller. Consolidate it to a single conceptual unit with Elevate.

wrappers.name: Nitron
wrappers.description: Nitron is an opinionated, loosely-coupled set of RubyMotion components designed to accelerate iOS development, especially with simpler iOS apps.

wrappers.name: ProMotion
wrappers.description: A full featured RubyMotion framework that makes iPhone development less like Objective-C and more like Ruby, designed to get up and running fast.

wrappers.name: motion-support
wrappers.description: A port of ActiveSupport to RubyMotion

wrappers.name: motion-speech
wrappers.description: Easy text-to-speech wrapper for AVSpeechSynthesizer in iOS 7.

wrappers.name: MotionModel
wrappers.description: Simple Model, Validation, and Input Mixins for RubyMotion.

wrappers.name: NanoStoreInMotion
wrappers.description: Wrapper for NanoStore, a lightweight schema-less key-value document database based on sqlite.

wrappers.name: MotionDataWrapper
wrappers.description: Intuitive querying and persistence of CoreData models, using Xcode to define entities, validations, relationships and migrations.

wrappers.name: Core Data Query - CDQ
wrappers.description: Easy-to-set-up library for using Core Data without Xcode

wrappers.name: motion-bindable
wrappers.description: Create two-way bindings between your models and view objects (or any other object.)

wrappers.name: Turnkey
wrappers.description: Utility for saving custom objects to NSUserDefaults using NSKeyedArchiver and NSKeyedUnarchiver

wrappers.name: yapper
wrappers.description: ORM for YapDatabase which is schemaless, very fast (thanks to YapDatabase's architecture), has chainable criteria, one-many relationships, on-the-fly reindexing and is thread-safe.

wrappers.name: Formotion
wrappers.description: Painless, productive views on iOS.

wrappers.name: Teacup
wrappers.description: A community-driven DSL for creating user interfaces on the iPhone.

wrappers.name: Geomotion
wrappers.description: Better iOS Geometry with RubyMotion.

wrappers.name: Walt
wrappers.description: Frictionless, hash-based iOS animations.

wrappers.name: AccordionView
wrappers.description: Create and add Accordions to your UIViews.

wrappers.name: motion-layout
wrappers.description: A nice way to use Auto Layout in your RubyMotion app.

wrappers.name: motion-stylez
wrappers.description: RubyMotion stylesheet library based off RMQ

wrappers.name: motion-form
wrappers.description: RubyMotion forms made easy

wrappers.name: MIMInputToolbar
wrappers.description: Input accessory view for your UITextFields and UITextViews.

wrappers.name: MotionFixtures
wrappers.description: Simple support for test fixtures.

wrappers.name: WebStub
wrappers.description: Easily stub out HTTP responses in RubyMotion specs.

wrappers.name: motion-stump
wrappers.description: Stubbing and mocking for RubyMotion.

wrappers.name: motion-frank
wrappers.description: A gem to use integrate frank-cucumber into RubyMotion projects.

wrappers.name: awesome_print_motion
wrappers.description: A port of the awesome_print gem to RubyMotion.

wrappers.name: motion-colorize
wrappers.description: Add some color to your RubyMotion output.

wrappers.name: motion-facon
wrappers.description: A port of Facon mocking library to RubyMotion.

wrappers.name: guard-motion
wrappers.description: Guard::Motion automatically run your RubyMotion specs (much like autotest)

wrappers.name: IB
wrappers.description: RubyMotion Interface Builder support, including outlets and actions.

wrappers.name: motion-schemes
wrappers.description: Expand RubyMotion build system to support building multiple apps from one project.

wrappers.name: motion-config-vars
wrappers.description: Heroku-style environment configuration for RubyMotion.

wrappers.name: MotionBundler
wrappers.description: Require and mock Ruby gems (including their dependencies) within RubyMotion applications.

wrappers.name: motion-xray
wrappers.description: An iOS Inspector that runs inside your app, so you can debug and analyze from your device in real-world situations.

wrappers.name: motion-sparkle
wrappers.description: motion-sparkle makes it easy to use Sparkle with your RubyMotion projects

wrappers.name: motion-env
wrappers.description: Sync ENV variables between Rakefile and RubyMotion

wrappers.name: motion-screenshots
wrappers.description: Automatic screenshots for your RubyMotion apps

wrappers.name: motion-my_env
wrappers.description: Simple environment variable solution for RubyMotion

wrappers.name: AFMotion
wrappers.description: A RubyMotion wrapper for AFNetworking.

wrappers.name: Motion-Plot
wrappers.description: A RubyMotion wrapper for CorePlot.

wrappers.name: ParseModel
wrappers.description: An Active Record pattern for your Parse models.

wrappers.name: motion-awesome
wrappers.description: DSL to easily create buttons and labels using the wonderful font-awesome library.

wrappers.name: Motion Parse
wrappers.description: Thin wrapper around the Parse SDK for RubyMotion.

wrappers.name: Parsistence
wrappers.description: A Parse.com wrapper similar to persistence.js.

wrappers.name: Twittermotion
wrappers.description: RubyMotion wrapper for the iOS Twitter API.

wrappers.name: motion-state-machine
wrappers.description: A Grand Central-aware, simple syntax for state machines.

wrappers.name: motion-ocr
wrappers.description: A RubyMotion wrapper for the OCR engine Tesseract.

wrappers.name: motion-addressbook
wrappers.description: A RubyMotion wrapper around the iOS & OSX Address Book frameworks.

wrappers.name: motionscan
wrappers.description: A RubyMotion wrapper around the image recognition SDK of Moodstocks.com.

wrappers.name: MapKitWrapper
wrappers.description: Make dealing with MapKit less painful for RubyMotion.

wrappers.name: can_i
wrappers.description: A RubyMotion wrapper providing a simple DSL for role authorization, similar to the CanCan gem.

wrappers.name: motion-inappmail
wrappers.description: A RubyMotion wrapper to use the email composer in your app.

wrappers.name: Joybox
wrappers.description: Cocos2D & Box2D Wrapper for RubyMotion.

wrappers.name: Helu
wrappers.description: A RubyMotion wrapper for the Store Kit Framework

wrappers.name: motion-acknowledgements
wrappers.description: This gem makes it easy to include the CocoaPods acknowledgements file in your application.

wrappers.name: motion-settings-bundle
wrappers.description: Create a Settings.bundle for your RubyMotion app

wrappers.name: Motion-Social
wrappers.description: Wrapper around the Social Framework

wrappers.name: motion-net-service
wrappers.description: A RubyMotion wrapper providing a simple DSL for the Bonjour (NSNetService) zero configuration network protocol.

wrappers.name: motion-firebase
wrappers.description: A RubyMotion wrapper for the Firebase SDK.

wrappers.name: simple_si
wrappers.description: A RubyMotion wrapper for SIAlertView

wrappers.name: motion-phrase
wrappers.description: Connect your RubyMotion project with PhraseApp for easy app internationalization. Translatable strings are exported while browsing the app and then managable through the PhraseApp translation editor.

wrappers.name: motion-accessibility
wrappers.description: Making accessibility accessible. RubyMotion Wrappers around the UIAccessibility protocols. Easily interact with Apple's impressive array of assistive technologies, including VoiceOver.

wrappers.name: motion-blitz
wrappers.description: RubyMotion wrapper for SVProgressHUD

wrappers.name: motion-objection
wrappers.description: RubyMotion wrapper for Objection

wrappers.name: RackMotion
wrappers.description: Intercept and alter HTTP requests and responses in RubyMotion

wrappers.name: StatusBar
wrappers.description: Notifications for the statusbar.

wrappers.name: motion-csv
wrappers.description: A RubyMotion friendly CSV parser gem.

wrappers.name: motion-takeoff
wrappers.description: A gem for scheduling stuff. You can use motion-takeoff to display messages at certain launch counts and schedule local notifications.

wrappers.name: motion-launchpad
wrappers.description: A gem providing a DSL allowing you to schedule events on specific launches of your application.  'motion-takeoff' only supplies displaying an alert, this gem executes any code block.

wrappers.name: Vendor
wrappers.description: A RubyMotion StoreKit Wrapper that allows you to buy, restore and get product info on your in app purchases and subscriptions.

wrappers.name: Motion-Wiretap
wrappers.description: A wrapper for KVO, gestures, UIControl events, and procs. Okay okay it's pretty much ReactiveCocoa in RubyMotion.

wrappers.name: motion-dynamic-type
wrappers.description: Simplifying even further iOS 7's Dynamic Type

wrappers.name: meteor-motion
wrappers.description: A wrapper for Meteor DDP with support for Motion Model

wrappers.name: motion-sqlite3
wrappers.description: A minimal wrapper over the SQLite 3 C API for RubyMotion

wrappers.name: MotionTemplate
wrappers.description: A clean RubyMotion project for quickly templating a styled application.

wrappers.name: promotion-template
wrappers.description: Utlize the bells and whistles of ProMotion to hit the ground running.

wrappers.name: rubymotion_generators
wrappers.description: Provides boilerplate code templates for RubyMotion
